sections.name: Short title
sections.description: This code shall be known as the Code of Ordinances, City of Jackson, Mississippi

sections.name: Definitions
sections.description: General definitions applicable throughout the code

sections.name: General penalty
sections.description: Violation of any provision not otherwise specified: fine up to $1,000 and/or 90 days imprisonment

sections.name: Mayor
sections.description: Chief executive officer of the city, elected at-large for 4-year term

sections.name: City Council
sections.description: Seven members elected from wards for 4-year terms

sections.name: City departments
sections.description: Police, Fire, Public Works, Planning, Parks and Recreation, Health, Legal

sections.name: Business license required
sections.description: No person shall conduct any business without first obtaining a license

sections.name: License fees
sections.description: Fees vary by business type, from $50 to $5,000 annually

sections.name: Alcoholic beverages
sections.description: Special permits required for sale of alcohol. Hours: 10 AM - 10 PM Sunday-Thursday, 10 AM - Midnight Friday-Saturday

sections.name: Food establishments
sections.description: Health permits required. Inspections conducted quarterly

sections.name: Tobacco retailers
sections.description: License required. No sales to persons under 21

sections.name: Pawnbrokers
sections.description: Special license required. Daily reporting of transactions to police

sections.name: Speed limits
sections.description: School zones: 15 MPH. Residential: 25 MPH. Business districts: 30 MPH. Highways: as posted

sections.name: Parking regulations
sections.description: Metered parking downtown: $0.50-$1.00/hour. Handicap violations: $150 fine. No overnight parking on residential streets without permit

sections.name: Towing
sections.description: Unauthorized vehicles may be towed from private property. Maximum tow fee: $125

sections.name: Abandoned vehicles
sections.description: Vehicles left on public streets over 72 hours may be impounded

sections.name: Traffic violations
sections.description: Fines range from $25 to $500. Court appearance required for serious violations

sections.name: Disorderly conduct
sections.description: Disturbing the peace, fighting, public intoxication. Fine: $100-$500, up to 90 days

sections.name: Noise ordinance
sections.description: Residential: 55 decibels daytime, 45 nighttime. Commercial: 65 daytime, 55 nighttime. Violation: $100-$500

sections.name: Curfew
sections.description: Minors under 17: 11 PM - 6 AM Sunday-Thursday, Midnight - 6 AM Friday-Saturday. Exceptions for work, school, emergency

sections.name: Public intoxication
sections.description: Being intoxicated in public place. Fine: $50-$500, up to 30 days

sections.name: Open container
sections.description: No open alcoholic beverage containers in public places or vehicles. Fine: $100-$500

sections.name: Loitering
sections.description: Remaining in public place for unlawful purpose. Fine: $50-$200

sections.name: Garbage collection
sections.description: Mandatory weekly pickup. Containers must be at curb by 7 AM on collection day

sections.name: Illegal dumping
sections.description: Fine: $500-$2,500. May include cleanup costs

sections.name: Rodent control
sections.description: Property owners must maintain rat-free premises

sections.name: Weed control
sections.description: Grass over 12 inches declared nuisance. City may cut and lien property

sections.name: Smoking restrictions
sections.description: No smoking in public buildings, restaurants, workplaces within 25 feet of entrances

sections.name: Building permits
sections.description: Required for new construction, additions over $500, electrical, plumbing, HVAC work. Fees based on project value

sections.name: Inspections
sections.description: Required for foundation, framing, electrical, plumbing, final occupancy

sections.name: Building codes
sections.description: Adopts International Building Code with local amendments

sections.name: Unsafe structures
sections.description: City may condemn and order demolition of dangerous buildings

sections.name: Contractor licensing
sections.description: General contractors must be licensed by city. Bond required

sections.name: Zoning districts
sections.description: R-1 (single family), R-2 (two family), R-3 (multi-family), C-1 (neighborhood commercial), C-2 (general commercial), I-1 (light industrial), I-2 (heavy industrial)

sections.name: Setback requirements
sections.description: R-1: Front 25 feet, sides 8 feet, rear 20 feet. Varies by district

sections.name: Height restrictions
sections.description: Residential: 35 feet. Commercial: varies by district, up to unlimited in downtown

sections.name: Signs
sections.description: Permit required. Size limits by district. No billboards in residential areas

sections.name: Variances
sections.description: Board of Adjustment may grant variances upon showing hardship

sections.name: Home occupations
sections.description: Permitted with restrictions on employees, signage, traffic, noise

sections.name: Minimum housing standards
sections.description: All dwellings must have adequate sanitation, heating, ventilation, electrical systems

sections.name: Rental registration
sections.description: All rental properties must be registered annually. Inspection fee: $50 per unit

sections.name: Lead paint
sections.description: Disclosure required for pre-1978 housing. Remediation required if hazard exists

sections.name: Vacant buildings
sections.description: Registration required for vacant properties over 60 days. Fee: $250 annually

sections.name: Nuisance abatement
sections.description: Code violations subject to fines, liens, and abatement by city

sections.name: Leash law
sections.description: Dogs must be leashed when off owner's property. Violation: $50-$200

sections.name: Animal license
sections.description: Dogs and cats must be licensed annually. Fee: $5 spayed/neutered, $25 intact

sections.name: Dangerous dogs
sections.description: Special registration and containment requirements. Insurance required: $100,000

sections.name: Limit on animals
sections.description: Maximum 4 dogs or cats per household without kennel license

sections.name: Cruelty to animals
sections.description: Fine: $500-$2,500, up to 6 months imprisonment

sections.name: Park hours
sections.description: 6 AM - 10 PM unless otherwise posted

sections.name: Prohibited activities
sections.description: No alcohol, glass containers, motorized vehicles off roads, hunting, fireworks without permit

sections.name: Pavilion reservations
sections.description: Available for private events. Fee: $50-$200 depending on size and amenities

sections.name: Water and sewer
sections.description: Municipal water and sewer service. Rates based on usage. Connection fees apply

sections.name: Stormwater
sections.description: Stormwater utility fee: $3-$10/month based on impervious surface

sections.name: Solid waste
sections.description: Weekly garbage and recycling collection. Fee included in utility bill

sections.name: Ad valorem tax
sections.description: Property tax rate set annually by City Council. Current rate: 38.64 mills for city services

sections.name: Sales tax
sections.description: State sales tax 7%. Additional 1% restaurant tax for tourism promotion

sections.name: Hotel/motel tax
sections.description: Additional 3% tax on hotel and motel stays

sections.name: Business personal property
sections.description: Taxable at same rate as real property. Annual filing required

procedures.trial: Bench trial (no jury in municipal court)

metadata.notes: State capital and most populous city in Mississippi. Full-service municipal government with comprehensive code enforcement.
